Token.Abstract: C4Notification protocol groups methods that are fundamental to basic ability for all C4 objects, visible or otherwise, to post, listen and stop listening for notifications.
Sets up a given object to listen for a given notification, and run a specific method.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification for which the object should listen

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: a string which represents the name of a method defined in the object's class or any of its superclasses, this parameter should be written as a string (e.g. @"test", @"changePosition:")

Token.Abstract: Sets up a given object to listen for a given notification from a specific object, and runs a specific method.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification for which the object should listen

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: a specific object to listen to

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: a string which represents the name of a method defined in the object's class or any of its superclasses, this parameter should be written as a string (e.g. @"test", @"changePosition:")

Token.Abstract: Sets up a given object to listen for a given notification from an array of objects, and runs a specific method.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification for which the object should listen

Parameter.Name: objectArray
Parameter.Abstract: a set of object to listen to

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: a string which represents the name of a method defined in the object's class or any of its superclasses, this parameter should be written as a string (e.g. @"test", @"changePosition:")

Token.Abstract: Stops an object from listening for a given notification.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification for which the object should stop listening

Token.Abstract: Stops an object from listening for a given notification which originates from a specific object.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification for which the object should stop listening

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: the object for which to stop listening

Token.Abstract: Stops an object from listening for a given notification which originates from a set of specific objects.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification for which the object should stop listening

Parameter.Name: objectArray
Parameter.Abstract: the set of objects for which to stop listening

Token.Abstract:
Creates a notification with a given string and posts it to the default notification center.
This method calls the postNotification:object: method of the default notification center passing a itself as the object.

Parameter.Name: notification
Parameter.Abstract: the name of a notification to be broadcast
